welcome.title: Welcome to Starlit Journals 🌟
welcome.content:
Hello and welcome to Starlit Journals! 🌟

We're so happy you've joined us. This is your safe and cozy space to write your thoughts, track your feelings, and grow one day at a time through journaling. 🌿

To help you begin, we've added 50 coins to your account as a welcome gift! Claim it in the next mail. 🎁 You can use them in the CozyShop to unlock journal themes, sticker packs, and other fun rewards.

✨ What you can do here:

  • 📝 Daily Journaling – Write about your day or how you're feeling by going to Start Journaling.
  • 🔥 Streak Milestones – Journal every day and earn coins when you hit milestones:
    • 7 days = 50 coins 🏆
    • 30 days = 150 coins 🎉
    • 100 days = 300 coins 👑
    • 365 days = 1000 coins + “Journaling Legend” theme 🌍
  • 📖 Entry Milestones – Get rewarded as you write more:
    • 10 entries = 25 coins ✍️
    • 50 entries = 150 coins 🌟
    • 100 entries = 250 coins 🏆
    • 365 entries = 750 coins + “Master Journaler” badge 🌈
  • 😊 Mood-Based Support – Choose how you're feeling each day. We'll send gentle, supportive notes based on your mood — whether you're happy, sad, or somewhere in between. 💖
  • 📊 Weekly Summary – Get a personal mail every week with your writing stats, your most frequent mood, and a journal prompt to help you reflect and grow.
  • 🎨 CozyShop – Visit the CozyShop to spend your coins and customize your journal with new themes and items.
  • 🌍 Public Journals – Want to share your thoughts with the world? Mark entries as public to appear in the Public Journals Feed where others can read, like, and follow your journey anonymously.
  • 👤 Customize Your Profile – Set an anonymous name and more in Profile Settings so others can discover and follow your public posts safely.
  • 📚 Your Personal Collection – All your private entries are safely stored in your Collections. Only you can see them unless you choose to share.

Whether you're here to reflect, express, heal, or just explore, we're here for you. Every entry you write is part of your personal journey—and we're so glad to be part of it. 🌈✨

Take a deep breath, open your heart, and start writing. Happy journaling! 💖
